title: Blue Hmong (1992) Genesis Portion
description: Blue Hmong translation of Genesis published by the United Bible Societies in 1992. The Blue Hmong are one of 54 ethnic minority groups in Vietnam. A subgroup of the Miao people, the majority of whom live in China.

language.name: Hmong Daw
language.autonym: lus Hmoob / lug Moob / lol Hmongb
language.area: South and southwest Guizhou, northwest Guangxi, southeast and southwest Yunnan. Also in France, Laos, Thailand, United States, Viet Nam.
